body: i read it in korean, here is the plot: the title is "my sister cant do addition". it is the same character from "imouto wa genius". she fell down the stairs and suffered brain damage. she can barely talk. her brother looks after her , they have sexytimes and the brother states that he and his sister are happier this way (her having to be looked after.) at the end, the brother says that since his sister's incident, he has been recieving anonymous emails containing perfectly written literature. and with that, he became an author.
Wait... did she actually kill herself and the sex scenes shown was actually part of a novel the brother was making? I don't speak moon runes so please explain.
Mein gott. She choose the worst.
